mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT xm_goods.id, xm_goods.goods_name, xm_goods.goods_status, xm_goods.goods_caption, xm_goods.goods_img, xm_goods.goods_color_id, xm_goods.goods_img_all, xm_goods.goods_info, xm_goods.goods_num, xm_goods.goods_date, xm_color.color_name AS colorByName, xm_versions.goods_price, xm_versions.version_name AS verisonByName, xm_goods.goods_version_id FROM xm_goods , xm_color , xm_versions WHERE xm_goods.goods_color_id = xm_color.color_id AND xm_goods.goods_version_id = xm_versions.versions_id AND xm_goods.goods_name = #{goodsName} AND xm_versions.versions_id =#{versionId}
